column1: Little Goat Diner////It was worth the wait.  Too much to choose from on a fun menu (Cereal Killer
column3: Simple/Healthy/Hungry Goat).  Kids both had the grilled cheese/fries off the kids menu
column4: I had the shrimp and grits
column5: he had the Bandade Belly Benedict.  We also ordered two sides of Gunthrop Farm bacon...cuz we like bacon.  It was a lot of food - and we ate all the bacon because it was thick and crispy.  Martinelli apple juice (kids)
column7: coffee black (me).  The coffee was dark and robust.  I usually take sugar sub and milk w/my coffee
column8: but the rich flavor of the coffee was good on its own.
